China: Toluid Civil War: Möngke's brother Ariq Böke declared himself khagan of the Mongol Empire.
Toluid Civil War: Kublai Khan, brother to Möngke and to Ariq Böke, was crowned khagan of the Mongol Empire.
Kublai appointed the Sakya lama Drogön Chögyal Phagpa Imperial Preceptor.
Lebanon: The county of Tripoli becomes a vassal state of the Mongol Empire.
Peru: Sinchi Roca was succeeded by his son Lloque Yupanqui.
Syria: Hulagu Khan, grandson of Genghis, conquered Damascus.
